allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript compilation errors in API routes

- Add type annotations to sort callback parameters in levels.routes.ts
- Add type assertions for lean\(\) query results in problems.routes.ts

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript type inference for uniqueSessions array

- Add type assertion to explicitly declare array as number[]
- Allows TypeScript to properly type-check sort callback

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(node -e "const Redis = require\(''ioredis''\); const redis = new Redis\(''redis://default:LNilfiPcpsTgclzIqiVSFKoLQmAYDyfA@crossover.proxy.rlwy.net:14305''\); redis.ping\(\).then\(r => {console.log\(''Redis OK:'', r\); redis.disconnect\(\);}\).catch\(e => {console.log\(''Redis Error:'', e.message\); process.exit\(1\);}\)")
